title: Assistant Outreach Specialist
job_overview:
As an Assistant Outreach Specialist, you will support the growth of our online presence through hands-on link-building efforts, including guest posting, citation submissions, and outreach coordination. Your work will directly impact the company’s SEO goals by securing high-quality backlinks and maintaining relationships with publishers. You’ll collaborate with the SEO team, monitor tools like Ahrefs, and ensure the smooth execution of outreach campaigns—all while working in a fast-paced, detail-oriented environment.

Key Responsibilities
-Execute link-building strategies with a focus on guest posting and citation submissions
-Use Ahrefs to identify backlink opportunities, track performance, and audit competitor links
-Assist in managing and maintaining outreach lists and relationships with bloggers and webmasters
-Follow up on outreach communications and track responses
-Apply foundational SEO knowledge to ensure links are relevant, natural, and aligned with best practices
-Assist in crafting email outreach templates and proposals when needed
-Perform basic analysis using Ahrefs, and support in reporting outreach KPIs
-Collaborate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to support broader SEO campaigns
-Maintain accurate records of outreach activity in shared documents
-Ensure consistency, attention to detail, and accuracy in all tasks
-Stay updated on industry trends and be open to learning new tools or methods
-Perform other related tasks as needed


Qualifications and Skills
-Hands-on experience with link building—especially guest posting and/or citation link outreach
-Foundational understanding of SEO concepts and terminology
-Proficiency with Ahrefs
-Bonus: Familiarity with Semrush, Moz, and Google Workspace (comfortable with basic functions and formulas)
-Strong attention to detail and proactive attitude
-Able to work independently with minimal supervision
-Excellent written and verbal communication skills
-Strong organizational and multitasking skills
-Willingness to learn, adapt, and take initiative
-Demonstrates sound judgment and common sense in work tasks


Basic Requirements
-Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
-Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
-Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection in case of outages


Work Details
-Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8:30 AM Manila Time
-Location: Anywhere in the Philippines


Why Join Us?
-Stable employment
-Competitive salary
-Bi-monthly salary
-A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
-Work-life balance
-Work-from-home opportunity
-The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet


For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to Upgrade to see actual info

 (Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION.)
